info.name: Color Waft
info.description: A wafting color shader that I found in my files and had obfuscated for some reason, idk why but feel free to try to unobfuscate it and publish it

renderpass.code:
void mainImage(out vec4 C,in vec2 p){float t=iTime/5.;
vec2 U=p.xy/iResolution.xy-.5;vec3 h=vec3(0.);for(float
i=0.;i<12.;i++){float r=.2;vec3 c=vec3((i+t*10.)/12.,1.
,1.);vec4 K=vec4(1.,2./3.,1./3.,3.);vec3 p=abs(fract(c.
xxx+K.xyz)*6.-K.www);h+=(.02*(sin(t*3.14159/2.*i)+2.))/
length(U-vec2(r*cos(2.*3.14159*i/12.+t/2.),r*sin(2.*
3.14159*i/12.+t)))*(c.z*mix(K.xxx,clamp(p-K.xxx,0.,1.),
c.y));}C=vec4(h,1.);}
renderpass.name: Image
